name: [Business]:: Test for mobile type audience where audienceId is invalid
fullName: test/integrations/component.test.ts#Component Test Suite /home/runner/work/rudder-transformer/rudder-transformer/test/integrations/destinations/criteo_audience/dataDelivery/data.ts Tests criteo_audience destination dataDelivery -> [Business]:: Test for mobile type audience where audienceId is invalid (index: 10)
description:
Feature: dataDelivery
      Description: [Business]:: Test for mobile type audience where audienceId is invalid
      Success Criteria: Should return a 400 status code with an error audience-invalid. It should also have the invalid audienceId in the error message as follows: "Audience <provided audienceId> is invalid"
      Scenario: business
      Test ID: criteo_audience_business_3
      API Version: v1
